Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of a pilot program for the remediation of mold and vermin conditions in certain multiple dwellings.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishment of a pilot program for the remediation of mold and vermin conditions in certain multiple dwellings.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of a pilot program for the remediation of mold and vermin conditions in certain multiple dwellings.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishment of a pilot program for the remediation of mold and vermin conditions in certain multiple dwellings.
